related_questions.question:

Introgative:......?
fill in the table!
​

answers.answer:

positif: they play football every Sunday

negative : they don't play football every Sunday

introgative : are they play football every Sunday?

Yang atas gua salah interogative nya
Yang bener : do they play football every sunday?

related_questions.question: Tigor and his family... the museum a.campong b. hiking c.visited d.swiming​

Fill in the blank with following verbs (lived ,came,went ,did,was)6. the crocodile ....hungry 7. my father ....to his office this morning 8.they ...to my party last sunday 9. the queen ...in the jungle 10. ....you watch the show yesterday

answers.answer:
~ Answer:

6. (e) was

The crocodile was hungry.

7. (c) went

My father went to his office this morning.

8. (b) came

They came to my party last Sunday.

9. (a) lived

The Queen lived in the jungle.

10. (d) did

Did you watch the show yesterday?

.

~ Discussion:

Halo dan salam kenal. Mari kita bahas cara penyelesaian pernyataan-pernyataan di atas dengan kata kerja yang sesuai ya.

「

Kita nyatakan semua pernyataan dalam bentuk pekerjaan/keberadaan yang berada di masa lalu yang menggunakan past tense.

」

》6. The crocodile ... hungry.

  • Kalimat ini termasuk bentuk nominal. Setiap kalimat nominal dibantu oleh kata kerja bantu (helping verb).

Helping verb untuk verbal form adalah did sedangkan nominal form adalah was/were.

—> jawabannya: e. was

》7. My father ... to his office this morning.

  • Kita dapat menyatakan dengan went. Alasannya karena adanya kata to menunjukkan tujuan kepergian. Dalam konteks ini, lebih sesuai dengan went ketimbang came karena subyek yang berada di tempat berasalnya akan meninggalkan tempat itu ke tempat lain sehingga diartikan bukan "datang" melainkan "pergi".

—> jawabannya: c. went

》8. They ... to my party last Sunday.

  • Adanya kata to menunjukkan tujuan kehadiran. Menurut konteks ini, subyek yang sudah tidak berada di tempat asalnya, sudah berada di tempat lain. Tempat lain itulah yang ditargetkan sehingga mereka menjadi "datang" bukan "pergi".

—> jawabannya: b. came

》9. The Queen ... in the jungle.

  • Kalimat di atas menyatakan keberadaan subyek. Kita dapat melengkapinya dengan kata kerja lived.

—> jawabannya: a. lived

》10. ... you watch the show yesterday?

  • Adanya tanda tanya membuktikan kalimat tersebut dalam bentuk interogatif.

Kalimat tersebut ada verba watch sehingga termasuk kalimat verbal. Gunakan kata kerja bantu did.

—> jawabannya: d. did

~ Thank you and hope this answer may be helpful.

Good luck! ✿

related_questions.question:
Diketahui data Panjang sisi-sisi segitiga sebagai berikut :    6 cm, 8 cm, 10 cm

7 cm, 8 cm, 9 cm

9 cm, 12 cm, 15 cm

10 cm, 24 cm, 25 cm

Segitiga yang berbentuk siku-siku ditunjukkan nomor ….

A

2 dan 3

B

1 dan 3

C

1 dan 2

D

1 dan 4


​

answers.answer:
6 cm 8cm, 10 cm
Penjelasan:
Segitiga siku siku mempunyai rumus a^2 + b^2 = c^2
6 kuadrat + 8 kuadrat = 10 kuadrat

related_questions.question:
There is a new mature tourism park in my town called Panorama Kedah Tempunak. The park is located in Tempunak    Kapuas village. It only takes thirty minutes from my house by motorcycle to go there. It is a very big park, with colorful
flowers everywhere. There are also many fruit plants, such as papayas, rambutans, rose apples, and dragon fruits. In
the middle of the park, there is a big lake. ive can explore the lake by using small duck-like boats. Next to the lake, there
is a grassy landscape that makes the park looks green and fertile. The park has some outdoor benches and hammocks
where we can sit and enjoy the view while eating snacks and drink. The park is really worth a visit.
36. What can we find in Panorama Kedah Tempunak?
A indoor benches
B. small river
C. friendly villagers
D. grassy landscape
37. How long does it take to go there from the writer house?
A. 20 minutes
B. 25 minutes
C.30 minutes
D. 35 minutes
38 Which statement is NOT TRUE about the park based on the text above?
A. There is a big lake in the middle of the park
C. there are lion-shape boats in the lake.
B. There are many fruit plants in the park
D. the park is located in Tempunak​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

nyimak iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya iya

Jawaban:

18. C. Beside

19. D

20. B

hope you find this helpful^•^

18. C
19. D
20. B

related_questions.question:
Read the following text to answer the q.    Pink Beach
Last holiday I went to Komodo island. There is a gorgeous beach which has pink colored-sand. The
beach is called Pink Beach or Pantai Merah Muda,
Il's a huge beach with a calm wave. When I looked it closely, I could see that it actually an ordinary
white beach sand. But there are a lot of crushed corals and minerals that make it looks pink. Pink beach is a
special beach, There's no one beach in this world has a beautiful pink sand like this.
1. What is the text about?
2. Where is it located ?
3. Why the sand has pink color?
4. Why does the writer think that Pink Beach is a special one?
5.
" ....... It actually an ordinary white beach sand."
What is the Indonesian translation of the underlined word ?​

answers.answer:
1. Pink beach

2. Komodo Island

3. Because a lot of crushed corals and minerals make the sand looks pink

4. because there's no one beach in this world has a beautiful pink sand like that

5. mana kata bergaris bawah nya?

semoga bermanfaat.

1.pink beach

2.in comodo island

3.Because that is a gorgeous beach

4.Because that's beach verry langkah

5.pantai merah.

Penjelasan:

SEMOGA TIDAK MEMBANTU
